sentence.text: We identified 52 variants contributing to obesity in 2% of cases including multiple novel variants in adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, which were sometimes found with accelerated growth rather than short stature as described previously.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Further validation in cohorts with severe obesity and engineering the variants in model organisms will be needed to explore whether human variants in angiogenesis and other genes that lead to obesity when deleted in apoptotic process, do contribute to obesity.
